title: How to know my IGNOU study centre if I have only the study centre code and IGNOU just updated the list of study centres and my study centre code is not there - Quora

response.answer_text: If You are looking for Regional Center:- Visit I.G.N.O.U. WebsiteGo to Student LoginFill your I.G.N.O.U. Enrollment Number, Course Name and Enter CaptchaNow the all information of your’s will visible.There you will find the Study Center optionClick on that. It will show your Center Detail!If You are looking for Study Center:- The detail of Study Center usually sent by the I.G.N.O.U. on your Phone through S.M.S. Study center is the place which you have to choose during the Admission Process. Think about what study center you choose at a time of admission and attend the classes.

When you had paid your fees you had got a registration slip.On that sheet the study centre name is available surely..Or you can do one thing go to the ignou site login your account your all details must be there... OK bro do that thing.

Please contact to your regional centre.They have the data of all study center under them.So please contact to ur regional centre by call or message.They will surely help you in this regards.🤗🤗Thank You.
